{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD 01.png |image1_size = 100px |caption = Mikrotik wAP ac Outdoor Wall AP |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD wAP |submodelappend = yes |submodel = ac |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = outdoor access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TV7RBWAP5AC2D |icid = 7442A-WAP5AC2D |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9556; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16EG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8033;AR8033-AL1A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;Level 4;;
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.8 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/09/2016 |estreldate = 05/01/2016 |estprice = 89 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01HY2HTNW |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01HY2HWRA |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Latvia
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|MikroTik}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP ac (RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD RBwAPG-5HacT2HnD] ('''wAP ac''') - 2.4GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBWAP5AC2D TV7RBWAP5AC2D] (11/09/2016) - ''MikroTik wAP ac'' :1x GbE ports, PoE 802.3at, 802.11abgn/ac, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9556 @720MHz, QCA9880, 16/64MB
==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP (RBwAP-2nD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAP2nD RBwAP-2nD] ('''wAP''') - 2.4GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBWAP2ND TV7RBWAP2ND] (12/09/2015) â€¢ [http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-tochki-dostupa-RBwAP2nD-wAP-Mikrotik review] :1x FE ports, PoE 802.3at, 802.11bgn, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD wAP R (RBwAPR-2nD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBwAPR-2nD RBwAPR-2nD] ('''wAP R''') - 2.4GHz Outdoor Wall AP :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7WAPR2ND TV7WAPR2ND] (08/07/2017) - ''MikroTik wAP R'' :1x FE ports, 1x Mini PCIe, PoE, 802.11bgn, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz, 16/64MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD QRT 2 (RBQRTG-2SHPnD)]] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RBQRTG-2SHPnD RBQRTG-2SHPnD] ('''QRT 2''') - FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TV7RBQRTG2SHPND TV7RBQRTG2SHPND] :2.4GHz Outdoor Flat 17dBi Panel Antenna (int. RouterBOARD) :1x GbE ports, PoE 802.3at (ns), 802.11bgn, RouterOS Level 4 :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9342 @600MHz (2T2R WiSoC), 16/64MB
